## DynamicForm interface

Describes a form that can render dynamically with the [DynamicFormComponent](./dynamic-forms.dynamicformcomponent.md) Creates a reactive form with visible fields to change the values of the form.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface DynamicForm<TForm extends object, TFormState extends object | null> extends DynamicAbstractGroup<TForm, TFormState> 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [DynamicAbstractGroup](./dynamic-forms.dynamicabstractgroup.md)<!-- -->&lt;TForm, TFormState&gt;

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [formStateSetters?](./dynamic-forms.dynamicform.formstatesetters.md) | (object \| Partial&lt;TFormState&gt;)\[\] | <i>(Optional)</i> A map of state setters for TFormState. |
|  [onSubmitFormatter?](./dynamic-forms.dynamicform.onsubmitformatter.md) | (f: TForm, s: Immutable&lt;Partial&lt;TFormState&gt;&gt;) =&gt; Immutable&lt;TForm&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> A function that modifies the form value when submitted. Use helper function [\_formStateSetter()](./dynamic-forms._formstatesetter.md) for dynamic state, or provide statically. |
|  [options?](./dynamic-forms.dynamicform.options.md) | [DynamicFormOptions](./dynamic-forms.dynamicformoptions.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> Customization options |
|  [resetState?](./dynamic-forms.dynamicform.resetstate.md) | Partial&lt;TForm&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The form value that will be set on reset |
|  [resettable?](./dynamic-forms.dynamicform.resettable.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Set to true if the form should have a reset option |
|  [submitText?](./dynamic-forms.dynamicform.submittext.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Should the form require the user to be online before submitting? |
